meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.3 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.3 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.9 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.9 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.0.Beta1 released!
meta.summary:
The first beta of the upcoming Vert.x 4.2 has just been released. We
  consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.

meta.title: Scala is here
meta.summary: The rise of Scala as one of the most important languages on the JVM caught many (me included) by surprise. This hybrid of functional and imperative paradigms struck a chord with many developers.

meta.title: TCP Client using Eclipse Vert.x, Kotlin and Gradle build
meta.summary: In this blog post, I demonstrate how to write a very simple TCP client that keeps a connection open to a custom-written server in cloud.
